review: I really love this product. My only wish is that there were more free Prime movies available.
author: Loretta Kelly

review: Of all the devices I use to stream Netflix, this is the only device that gives me issues.  I hardly use it and when I do, it takes minutes for me to enjoy watching something because of the constant resetting I must do.  I've called customer service and they only assist me in resetting it but with no permanent fix.
author: Amazon Customer

review: love it :) smooth interface and easy to use and login to with all my accounts. keep adding more apps and we'll be good!

review: Have really enjoyed our Amazon Fire TV.  Use it every day!
author: Millenbeck

review: It would be 5 stars, but the first unit shipped to me was defective -- it wouldn't boot up at all. Customer service was great -- and prompt in deciding to ship me a replacement unit. The replacement unit worked fine -- and, so far, no problems encountered. I am on a DSL internet connection (only option available) and it works just fine when streaming. It passed that test with flying colors!!
author: John Guibert

review: No problems at all. We love this fire tv. Use it all the time!
